name: Epic Battle Simulator 2
description: Are you ready to experience the most EPIC strategies of your life? Don't wait!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 Processor: 2 GHz or Faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Newer Processor: 3 GHz or Faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce GTX 750 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
